field_speakers.processed: Eswar Prasad (Cornell University; Brookings Institution; National Bureau of Economic Research)

field_organizers.processed: Harvard University Fairbank Center For Chinese Studies

field_description.processed: This lecture will discuss China’s economic prospects, policies, and reforms, and their implications for its role in international finance. The lecture will cover China’s economy, financial markets, and the renminbi, and also touch upon the country’s new digital currency.
